column1: If you're looking for someone to blame @CheriBustos look in the mirror. Our internal polls were spot-on. It's a sign of poor leadership when you flail & blame others for your own party's shortcomings. Voters rejected what House Dems were selling. Own it. https://t.co/5wWZA4wUEH

I'd like to thank voters across #IL13 for giving me the honor of representing our communities for another term in Congress. It has been the privilege of a lifetime to be our voice in Washington. I won't let you down. #twill https://t.co/P9dYeK02bS

With 1.5M+ voter contacts our 500+ volunteers on Team Davis have achieved our biggest ground game ever in #IL13: ✅275787 door knocks ✅841917 phone calls ✅502621 texts Thank you to our volunteers whose work will push us across the finish line & lead us to victory! 🇺🇸🗳 https://t.co/N9iFmZHDiC

Thanks to the over 300 volunteers who are out talking to voters today across #IL13. Vols have made over one million voter contacts at the doors and on the phones since the beginning of this campaign and we’re going to finish strong on Tuesday. Remember to vote early or on Nov. 3! https://t.co/YxPcfOnuCN

I'm proud to be endorsed by @NFIB FedPAC and small businesses across #IL13. In Congress I'm working to strengthen our #smallbiz by cutting red tape lowering taxes and helping them get through this pandemic with bipartisan initiatives like the Paycheck Protection Program. https://t.co/Q2lfoWfTQP

Politicians in Springfield and DC have let us down. My opponent is part of the Madigan Machine and she'll bring more dysfunction and corruption to DC. I'm fighting for bipartisan solutions to lower healthcare costs and strengthen #smallbiz. I'd appreciate your vote. https://t.co/ujb3xgy3Tn

Mike Madigan and lawmakers in the #IL General Assembly should not be given more power to raise income taxes. They've mismanaged taxpayer dollars for decades. This tax hike will hit #smallbiz and farmers in #IL13. Please vote no on the tax hike amendment. https://t.co/NPF1MxbP0h

I'm proud to have the support of @necanet. I'll always have the back of our working men and women. In Congress I've supported tax cuts for the middle class and pro-labor policies like Davis-Bacon and PLAs. I also support energy and infrastructure investments to create new jobs. https://t.co/2gO8C6GrAn

It's sad that my opponent Betsy Londrigan is lying about me and my family in TV ads. Independent fact checkers have repeatedly said she's not telling the truth. I'm proud to support the bipartisan Paycheck Protection Program because it saved over 2 million #IL jobs. https://t.co/K1bO99yIPJ

I'm proud to be supported by the men & women of @UAPipeTrades. I'll always fight for working families even if it means standing up to my own party. In Congress I've supported Davis-Bacon PLAs & new infrastructure investments to grow good-paying jobs. @battleground_ua #UAVotes https://t.co/Xw1Wieio2x

It’s sad my opponent asked a small business owner to lie in a TV ad just so she could win an election. This is right out of the Madigan Machine playbook. Instead of debating issues she smears every #smallbiz helped by the Paycheck Protection Program. https://t.co/wA3oFPKtvl

I'm proud to be supported by the letter carriers of @NRLCA. The Postal Service is vital to #IL13 communities particularly our rural towns. The hardworking men and women of the USPS keep our country moving. That's why I support them and our local post offices in Congress. https://t.co/cVAaI7ewQ8

Correctional workers are an integral part of our criminal justice system. Every day they work to keep us safe. That's why I'm proud to be endorsed by the Council of Prison Locals-33. In Congress I've fought to make sure correctional workers have the support they need. https://t.co/J3Zjj7eaGF

Protecting coverage for pre-existing conditions is personal to Rodney. His wife Shannon is a 21-year cancer survivor. That’s why Rodney has introduced and co-sponsored several bills to protect pre-existing conditions. #IL13 #WICSdebate

Betsy Londrigan wants to put government in the driver’s seat of the American health care system. She supports a govt-run insurance plan that would cut hospital funding by $800 billion and close up to 39 rural hospitals in #IL. #IL13 #WICSdebate

Rodney has worked with both parties in Congress to fix our nation’s health care system. Rodney supports a bipartisan solution to fix Obamacare and improve upon our private and employer-sponsored insurance system. #IL13 #WICSdebate

Rodney is the 13th most bipartisan member of Congress in the entire country and the most bipartisan member from #IL. He knows we need to work together to get through the pandemic and bring our country together. #IL13 #WICSdebate

I'm honored to be endorsed by @CRCCarpenters. I'm proud to support carpenters & other building tradesmen and women in Congress through Davis-Bacon PLAs infrastructure investment & more. Let's grow our economy so we can create new jobs & give working families a raise. https://t.co/dSiyTPwgFL

I'm proud to be endorsed by @AFFI1935. I'm fighting for our firefighters in Congress every day. Especially during this pandemic we need to do everything we can to support our first responders and make sure they have the resources they need to do their jobs and keep us safe. https://t.co/ohlAVB1xQt

It’s sad my opponent had a small business owner lie in a TV ad just so she could win an election. This is right out of the Madigan playbook. Instead of debating issues she smears my family and every #smallbiz helped by the Paycheck Protection Program. https://t.co/o5kSqia940

Honored to be endorsed by the @MineWorkers. I said I would support our coal miners in Congress and I kept my promise by voting to protect the pensions and healthcare benefits of tens of thousands of coal miners and their families in #IL13 and across the country. https://t.co/XRgDMzhR3U

Proud to be endorsed by the Operating Engineers. I'm fighting for good-paying jobs & increased investments in our infrastructure. I support Davis-Bacon & PLAs. I've even stood up to some in my own party who push anti-union policies. I'll always fight for working men & women. https://t.co/9yW7WrBgzd

I'm proud to be endorsed by @ILFarmBureau ACTIVATOR. Whether it’s opposing tax hikes on farmers supporting the RFS opening up markets for farmers or expanding access to broadband I’m committed to supporting policies that strengthen our farm families and rural communities. https://t.co/DyQUdWfSxC

I'm honored to be endorsed by @NALC_National and the many letter carriers who live and work across #IL13. The hardworking men and women of the Postal Service keep our country moving. I’m proud to support them and our local post offices in Congress. https://t.co/yqW55hh9qz
Independent fact checkers have confirmed she’s lying. Voters shouldn’t be surprised because she continues to lie about her connections to Mike Madigan and the money she earns from corporate lobbying.

It’s sad my opponent has to resort to outright lies about my family to win an election. This is right out of the Madigan Machine playbook. Instead of debating issues she smears my family & every small business owner helped by the bipartisan PPP program. https://t.co/hLh39EJr6f

In Congress I was proud to work with both parties to pass the Paycheck Protection Program which helped support #smallbiz and save over 2 million #IL jobs. I’m fighting every day to bring both parties together and solve problems. https://t.co/SsNRQoA9lB
Rodney is the 13th most bipartisan member of Congress and the most bipartisan from the #IL delegation. He knows we need to work together to get through the Pandemic.

My wife Shannon is a 21-year colon cancer survivor. The genetic form of cancer that she had is a pre-existing condition she will live with for the rest of her life and it affects our children too. Protecting pre-existing conditions and improving healthcare is personal to me. https://t.co/HZf397JFSn

Londrigan has received nearly $300000 from Mike Madigan and continues to raise money for Madigan through their joint fundraising agreement. Londrigan won't stand up to Madigan because he's funding her campaign.

Protecting coverage for pre-existing conditions is personal to Rodney. His wife Shannon is a 21-year cancer survivor. That’s why Rodney has introduced and co-sponsored several bills to protect pre-existing conditions. #IL13 #Election2020

Betsy Londrigan wants to put government in the driver’s seat of the American health care system. She supports a govt-run insurance plan that would cut hospital funding by $800 billion and could close up to 39 rural hospitals in #IL. #IL13 #Election2020
Rodney is the 13th most bipartisan member of Congress and the most bipartisan from the #IL delegation. He knows we need to work together to get through the Pandemic. #IL13 #Election2020

Betsy Londrigan is lying to get elected. Londrigan says she doesn’t take campaign cash from Madigan or corporate interests but that’s not true. Madigan has spent nearly $300k to elect Londrigan and her campaign has received $82k from corporate lobbyists including Big Pharma. https://t.co/alMZMLLHw4

Betsy Londrigan supports a massive government-run health insurance plan. It could have disastrous consequences for rural hospitals in #IL13 and jeopardize your care. I’m working to strengthen rural hospitals and protect coverage for pre-existing conditions. https://t.co/BGftzi4bM7

Betsy Londrigan supports a government-run insurance plan that could force the closure of up to 55% of America's rural hospitals including up to 39 rural hospitals in #IL. Londrigan's liberal plan would destroy jobs and jeopardize care. Learn more here: https://t.co/yJmv1yQxsh https://t.co/KOA7pIbCDY

I was proud to support the bipartisan Paycheck Protection Program in Congress. It provided lifeline loans to #IL13 small businesses like Myler Automotive and helped them keep employees on the payroll. Let's work together and do more to support #smallbiz during the pandemic. https://t.co/kWK65fIXl9

My opponent Betsy Londrigan is part of the Madigan Machine. Londrigan's campaign is bankrolled by Madigan and she raises campaign cash for him. She refuses to call on Madigan to resign even after his implication in a bribery scheme. Londrigan would make Washington more corrupt. https://t.co/Y8BHg0BQqG

Betsy Londrigan won't call on Madigan to resign because her campaign needs his financial support even though that support comes with Madigan’s corruption baggage. That doesn’t matter to Londrigan though because she will do anything to win. https://t.co/4wHqA77JHp

Unlike my opponent I oppose the Pritzker-Madigan tax hike amendment because it would raise taxes on many #IL13 small businesses & family farms during this tough economy. That's wrong. #IL politicians don't deserve more power to raise your taxes. Vote no. https://t.co/ugk3WU2YJT

Whether it’s opposing tax increases on farmers supporting the RFS opening up foreign markets for American farmers or expanding access to broadband I’m committed to supporting policies that strengthen our farming families and rural communities. https://t.co/GA6y2FKIZW

It was great to join the McLean and Sangamon Co. Farm Bureaus this morning. It's an honor to be named a "Friend of Agriculture." Ag is critical to the #IL13 economy. That's why I fight for our farmers in Congress. Thank you to @ILFarmBureau ACTIVATOR for endorsing our campaign. https://t.co/e1ZZKvoQ6f

Betsy Londrigan announced her support for Mike Madigan's tax hike on #smallbiz and farmers. Londrigan wants to give politicians more power to raise taxes even in this tough economy. Londrigan always chooses her corrupt party boss over #IL families. https://t.co/I3yBTSw9qk

The hardworking men and women of the Postal Service keep our country moving and working. That's why I'm proud to support them and our #IL13 post offices in Congress. Thank you to the #IL affiliate of @NALC_National for your endorsement. https://t.co/aSGSi74s21

I was at the RNC yesterday. The protests were far from peaceful. When Speaker Nancy Pelosi calls Republicans "enemies of the state" we shouldn't be surprised when this happens. The violence and looting across our country must come to an end. https://t.co/98246zY8RQ

If we expect frontline workers to go to work every day elected officials should do the same. The people of #IL13 need to know their member of Congress will show up. That’s why I’m committed to participating in 3 in-person debates. https://t.co/7b0Rbh6zxl

I'd like to thank @ACC_National for their endorsement. I've been proud to work with colleagues from both sides of the aisle to protect our environment and public lands. That's why I've co-sponsored legislation like the Great American Outdoors Act. Thank you for your support! https://t.co/Ku5JO87niS

Betsy Londrigan is lying about support she's received from Mike Madigan because she knows he's toxic. Londrigan's campaign has received over $293000 from a political committee Madigan has chaired for decades. https://t.co/j8azLN1SuI

When Mike Madigan issued his "I'm not resigning" statement last week he took time to say he'll "continue to lead the effort" to elect Democrats like Betsy Londrigan to Congress. That tells us all we need to know about Londrigan. https://t.co/c0kvgnSzwa

Instead of enabling Madigan's corruption Londrigan should join me in calling on Madigan to resign as #IL House Speaker and Chairman of the Democratic Party of Illinois.  Learn more here: https://t.co/t8OsxJp5CW

I have called on Mike Madigan to resign immediately. The people of #IL have suffered from his corruption long enough. My opponent Betsy Londrigan has taken the opposite approach. She continues to raise campaign cash for him and work hand-in-hand with his political organization. https://t.co/HaF98LAd9w

Last week Mike Madigan was implicated in a years-long $1.3 million bribery scheme yet Betsy Londrigan continues to raise campaign cash for Madigan and work hand-in-hand with his political machine. Londrigan is enabling Madigan's corruption. https://t.co/163HeMqZBf

Betsy Londrigan is teaming up with Mike Madigan to raise money for her political campaign. It's time for her to come clean about her close ties to Madigan and tell voters where she stands on Madigan’s disastrous agenda. https://t.co/TfKfkgPSoC

We need bipartisan health care solutions. That’s why I’ve worked with lawmakers from both parties to make critical investments in hospitals protect nurses from furloughs and help out-of-work Americans keep their employer-sponsored health insurance. https://t.co/61IOUgVq5g

Advocating for funding cuts to hospitals & health care workers in the middle of a pandemic is a terrible idea. Maybe that’s why Londrigan dodged a question about her plan that she’s supported for years. Partisan plans like hers won’t work. https://t.co/EEx4D05lSV

My opponent @BetsyforIL supports Medicare X also known as the Medicare public option. A key part of the plan’s “cost savings” is achieved by cutting funding for hospitals doctors and nurses by $800 billion over a 10-year period. https://t.co/nJxXXzug7F

We had a great time this morning at my hometown’s Independence Day parade. It was good to see so many friends and neighbors from around Christian County. Have a safe and enjoyable holiday weekend. God bless America! https://t.co/hB6M36SQ6Z
Terrible. A veteran’s service should never be trivialized like this. I’d be proud to serve in Congress with @MikeGarcia2020. https://t.co/xl944PhfTM
